R

randomPosition() - Static method in class gametools.Tools
Generates a completely random position that is greater than zero.
randomPosition(Area) - Static method in class gametools.Tools
Generates a random position within the passed in area.
remove(int) - Method in class gametools.Group
Removes the specified sprite from the group.
remove(Sprite) - Method in class gametools.Group
Removes the specified sprite from the group.
remove(Group) - Method in class gametools.Group
Removes all the sprites from the group that match the ones passed in.
remove(Sprite...) - Method in class gametools.Group
 
remove(List<Sprite>) - Method in class gametools.Group
Removes all the sprites from the group that match the ones passed in.
removeScript() - Method in class gametools.Group
 
removeScript() - Method in class gametools.Sprite
 
removeSprites() - Method in class gametools.Group
 
removeSprites(boolean) - Method in class gametools.Group
 
removeWhenOffScreen() - Method in class gametools.Group
Removes all sprites automatically as soon as they leave the screen.
reset() - Method in class gametools.Animation
Resets and restarts the animations.
reset() - Method in class gametools.Sound
Sets the sound back to the start without interrupting playback.
rotate(Position, Sprite.Rotation) - Method in class gametools.Group
Rotates all the sprites in the group around the specified position.
rotate(Position, double) - Method in class gametools.Position
Rotates the point around the specified position.
rotate(Position, Sprite.Rotation) - Method in class gametools.Sprite
Rotates the sprite around the specified position at the sprite's speed.
rotate(Position, double) - Method in class gametools.Sprite
Rotates the sprite around the specified position at the passed in amount.
run() - Method in class gametools.Game
Method that updates at the specified FPS (the default is 60) that should contain most the main game code.
